## CommandLineParser.onExecuteAsync() method

This hook allows the subclass to perform additional operations before or after the chosen action is executed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected onExecuteAsync(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
